### Self-Hosted

Formaloo On-Premise: Your Very Own Formaloo
-------------------------------------------

Do you have sensitive data that you need to store in-house? Do you need extra encryptions & access management? Formaloo On-Premise (Self-Hosted) is a dedicated full version of Formaloo that will install on your own servers and you will have your very own databases with all of your customizations.

[Request a demo](https://formaloo.com/demo)

![Image 320](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578dea6dfba7eb6b0be7001_on-premise%20section%20image.png)

Questions & answers
-------------------

Read the answers to the most frequently asked questions about our plans

### Do I need to put my credit card information to use Formaloo free plan?

![Image 321: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Nope!

### **What payment methods do you offer?**

![Image 322: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

All payments are handled securely by Stripe. We accept all major credit cards, and (in select countries) direct debit. We also support transactions in a range of currencies.

### **What is your refund policy?**

![Image 323: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

If for any reason you aren’t completely satisfied with the plan you purchased from us or it just does not meet your expectations, you can ask for a full refund within 14 days after your purchase. No questions asked!

### **How do I switch to a different plan? Will I lose if I have time left?**

![Image 324: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

You can switch to a new plan at any time by going to the Billing page in your account. Select the plan you’d like to switch to and immediately start using new features. No, you will not lose anything! If you have time remaining from your previous plan, its amount will be added to your account as credit and you can use it!

### **What happens to my apps & databases if I don’t renew my account?**  

![Image 325: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Nothing! We just change your plan to our free version. All your apps, forms, and databases will be safe and will not be deleted. If you need the additional features, you can upgrade again anytime you want.

### **Is Formaloo free to use?**

![Image 326: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Yes! Formaloo has multiple packages to help teams of all sizes orchestrate their work. Our Free plan is available to teams for no charge to help you build your databases. The Free plan is free forever and is designed for small teams or those with lightweight needs. Our paid plans offer additional power and scale for teams as they grow and their needs get more complex.

### **Can I move/export my data?**

![Image 327: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Yes we offer various methods of exporting and integration your data anywhere you want. You can also delete or deactivate your own data and forms anytime you want.

### **How much does Formaloo AI cost?**

![Image 328: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Formaloo AI is included in all upgraded workspaces, and you also receive a free trial. Each of Formaloo AI's modules use your AI credits to operate. You can always add more credits to your account if you need more AI operations without upgrading to a higher plan.

### **Can I have all of my data in my own server and database?**

![Image 329: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Yes. With Formaloo Enterprise (Self-Hosted) you can have a full version of Formaloo on your own servers. Please [contact us](https://www.formaloo.com/en/contact/) for more information on this part.

### **Is Formaloo GDPR compliance?**

![Image 330: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Short answer is YES. Please read our special [GDPR FAQ](https://www.formaloo.com/en/gdpr/) right here.

### **Is my data safe?**

![Image 331: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Formaloo is famous for its security. We have developed a comprehensive set of practices, technologies, and policies to ensure your data is secure.

### **Do you offer discounts for educators, non-profits, or startups?**

![Image 332: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Yes! You can enjoy up to 50% discount if you fit one of these categories. Please apply to get verified and receive your discount.  
Also eligible startups recive up to $1,000 in credits.

### **What is the pricing for Formaloo Enterprise?**

![Image 333: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

With increased scalability, security and support, Enterprise plans are a great pick if you're planning to roll out Formaloo across multiple teams or departments. Formaloo's pricing scales to fit enterprise teams at every stage and we work with you to find the custom fit for your situation. You can [book a demo with us to learn more](https://formaloo.com/demo).

14 days money back guarantee!

If for any reason you aren’t completely satisfied with the plan you purchased from us or it just does not meet your expectations, you should notify us within 14 days from the date of the purchase and we will process your the refund.

### Self-Hosted

Formaloo On-Premise: Your Very Own Formaloo
-------------------------------------------

Do you have sensitive data that you need to store in-house? Do you need extra encryptions & access management? Formaloo On-Premise (Self-Hosted) is a dedicated full version of Formaloo that will install on your own servers and you will have your very own databases with all of your customizations.

[Request a demo](https://www.formaloo.com/demo)

![Image 317](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578dea6dfba7eb6b0be7001_on-premise%20section%20image.png)

Questions & answers
-------------------

Read the answers to the most frequently asked questions about our plans

### Do I need to put my credit card information to use Formaloo free plan?

![Image 318: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Nope!

### **What payment methods do you offer?**

![Image 319: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

All payments are handled securely by Stripe. We accept all major credit cards, and (in select countries) direct debit. We also support transactions in a range of currencies.

### **What is your refund policy?**

![Image 320: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

If for any reason you aren’t completely satisfied with the plan you purchased from us or it just does not meet your expectations, you can ask for a full refund within 14 days after your purchase. No questions asked!

### **How do I switch to a different plan? Will I lose if I have time left?**

![Image 321: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

You can switch to a new plan at any time by going to the Billing page in your account. Select the plan you’d like to switch to and immediately start using new features. No, you will not lose anything! If you have time remaining from your previous plan, its amount will be added to your account as credit and you can use it!

### **What happens to my apps & databases if I don’t renew my account?**  

![Image 322: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Nothing! We just change your plan to our free version. All your apps, forms, and databases will be safe and will not be deleted. If you need the additional features, you can upgrade again anytime you want.

### **Is Formaloo free to use?**

![Image 323: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Yes! Formaloo has multiple packages to help teams of all sizes orchestrate their work. Our Free plan is available to teams for no charge to help you build your databases. The Free plan is free forever and is designed for small teams or those with lightweight needs. Our paid plans offer additional power and scale for teams as they grow and their needs get more complex.

### **Can I move/export my data?**

![Image 324: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Yes we offer various methods of exporting and integration your data anywhere you want. You can also delete or deactivate your own data and forms anytime you want.

### **How much does Formaloo AI cost?**

![Image 325: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Formaloo AI is included in all upgraded workspaces, and you also receive a free trial. Each of Formaloo AI's modules use your AI credits to operate. You can always add more credits to your account if you need more AI operations without upgrading to a higher plan.

### **Can I have all of my data in my own server and database?**

![Image 326: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Yes. With Formaloo Enterprise (Self-Hosted) you can have a full version of Formaloo on your own servers. Please [contact us](https://www.formaloo.com/en/contact/) for more information on this part.

### **Is Formaloo GDPR compliance?**

![Image 327: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Short answer is YES. Please read our special [GDPR FAQ](https://www.formaloo.com/en/gdpr/) right here.

### **Is my data safe?**

![Image 328: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Formaloo is famous for its security. We have developed a comprehensive set of practices, technologies, and policies to ensure your data is secure.

### **Do you offer discounts for educators, non-profits, or startups?**

![Image 329: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

Yes! You can enjoy up to 50% discount if you fit one of these categories. Please apply to get verified and receive your discount.  
Also eligible startups recive up to $1,000 in credits.

### **What is the pricing for Formaloo Enterprise?**

![Image 330: FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/656ce8668244222553627f66/6578e85d989c1bed19950429_faq%20expand%20icon.svg)

With increased scalability, security and support, Enterprise plans are a great pick if you're planning to roll out Formaloo across multiple teams or departments. Formaloo's pricing scales to fit enterprise teams at every stage and we work with you to find the custom fit for your situation. You can [book a demo with us to learn more](https://www.formaloo.com/demo).

14 days money back guarantee!
=============================

If for any reason you aren’t completely satisfied with the plan you purchased from us or it just does not meet your expectations, you should notify us within 14 days from the date of the purchase and we will process your the refund.
